history.proof: unfold disjoint. split. - intros H. split. + sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros. unfold disjoint. split. - intros H. split. + intros [y [H1 H2]]. apply H. exists y. auto. + intros z Hz. apply H. exists z. split; auto. - intros [H1 H2] y [Hy1 Hy2]. apply not_and_or in H1. destruct H1. + contradiction. + apply H2. split; auto.
